alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 1:09PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Quick Hitting Colder Storm Expected On Thursday... A weaker system, relatively speaking, will quickly sweep through the region out ahead of Friday and Saturday`s more potent atmospheric river event. This system will be colder in nature with snow levels starting at all elevations and gradually rising through Thursday afternoon. Light snowfall accumulations of generally 1 inch or less is possible across much of the Basin and Range, with up to 3 inches across higher elevations above 6,000 feet. Slick and icy roadway conditions are possible. Check with NDOT for the latest roadway conditions by downloading their app, or calling 5 1 1.
